amendment.description: To provide for the issuance of rules relating to Personal Dust Monitor prototypes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1644 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1644 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324, S11328-11329; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11324) To provide for the issuance of rules relating to Personal Dust Monitor prototypes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1644 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1644 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
